game.name: Lambo Drifter
game.description:
It is time to reserve your seat in a luxury car and get participated in the biggest car drifting competition. Book your seat behind the steering wheel of a luxury car Lamborghini and start drifting in a way you always wanted! Join Lambo Drifter game and show off the world that you are amazing at drifting as much as possible! Keep drifting and securing points to unlock new cars, tracks and achievements in this brand new racing game! 
Common, friends! We know that you are blessed with the amazing drifting skills. All you need is put your driving skills to challenge to beat the previous best score of your friends and wear the crown of being the best Lambo drifter of all the time. Get a pleasure of racing around a wider range of courses and take control of different Lamborghini super cars in this awesome drifting game! Choose anyone from the top car models including Aventador, Murcielago, Reventon and Gallardo! 
Not all the models are available for you to ride in the beginning. Use the points you collect during the gameplay to unlock the top car models in this one of the top 3D car drifting games! Decide whether you want to ride during the day on the snow or the race track or during the night in the port! When you try this cool HTML5 game, you are sure to experience the matchless freedom and unlimited possibilities. Good luck to get a pleasure of driving and drifting an expensive in car driving games!
